text: I keep getting intermittent thoughts about suicide  and each time they come back they feel stronger Recently my life has been a mix of positives and negatives   I was accepted to transfer into a relatively prestigious university for my desired major  That was good  but for some reason I felt no satisfaction  despite having worked hard for it   My girlfriend and I of   months recently broke up  It s been   months now  but I really miss her  We didn t have a bad breakup either  it was just the fact that we were attending different universities across the entire country  she s a year younger than me so she wasn t in uni yet  I can t stop thinking of her  she really was the perfect girlfriend   Right now I work a job that I absolutely hate  It s   hours a week and pays decent but it s dangerous and physically taxing  I want to quit but my parents threaten to kick me out of the house if I do  I don t have anywhere else to go   Idk maybe the general ambiance of the world doesn t help   I have long held the belief that life is primarily suffering and it is broken up with intermittent moments of happiness  not the inverse  That kinda led me to the belief that in some scenarios suicide can certainly be rational and lack moral culpability   That leads me to the thought process that if I have no one who cares about me and I decide to suicide  it s not wrong and may even be objectively correct   That thought process coupled with my own negative emotions have caused me to grow increasingly suicidal  Sorry for the rant   Anyone have tips in general or specifically how to move on from my girlfriend
summary: My girlfriend and I recently broke up and I miss her. I was accepted to transfer into a prestigious university for my desired major. I work a dangerous and physically taxing job. My parents threaten to kick me out of the house if I don't quit.
cleaned: girlfriend recently break miss accept transfer prestigious university desire major work dangerous physically tax job parent threaten kick house not quit

text: The shittiest part about wanting to die are my reasons why I m too exhausted to explain it all  and I wouldn t know where to start  but so many of the traumatic experiences from my childhood are crushing me  I feel beyond help  I m triggered constantly by the uneven shifts between myself and my half siblings  who were given everything they could ever have wanted or needed as children  while I had nothing I grew up in another  poor and abusive  household and was excluded from everything  because my stepmom hated me  She didn t want me around  and made it very clear  I wasn t on any Christmas cards  I never went on any of their vacations  They contributed absolutely nothing to my healthcare or overall wellness  and when I was suicidal as a young teen  my dad told me I was selfish  My sisters have beautiful smiles from braces  and the youngest is having her college paid for entirely  I didn t have any of that  And I hate how ugly it makes me feel  I hate that I m so envious  and how I feel so left out  Mostly  I hate that my brain s immediate solution to these feelings is to say  You should just kill yourself because the pain is never going away   I have C PTSD  depression  and a diagnosis of a general anxiety disorder  I think my mental illness is mostly caused by my past  I don t think my brain was ever truly wired to be this way  I think years of pain have beat me down to a point where I can t differentiate between then and now  I have bouts of uncontrollable anger  and crippling depression  I look at my smile and can t smile anymore  I don t want to live like this anymore

text: the people at my school are literally insane  and have no problem destroying property while on camera I go to an all boys highschool and people there can be totally barbaric  Our school has   exits  the front gate and the side gate  A fair amount of the school goes out the side gate  like me  but every once in a while  the person supposed to unlock the gate doesn t get there before school ends  On wednesday  when we got to the side gate  there was a whole crowd there waiting for someone with keys to show up  Here s where the problem starts  You see  there is a wooden fence that the school shares with another person s property  and there is a small gap in the wood that allows you to get over the fence  created a long time ago  After   minutes of waiting  and a handful of students already up  over and out  more people look at the fence as a more viable option  As more people want to go through  they start to put  more  holes in the fence  throwing planks of wood onto the grass  We know that there is a camera on the neighbours house  probably for this reason  but that doesn t stop them  More and more kids go over until  finally  a teacher decides to show up  after like   minutes  probably because some kid decided to try and get the gate open  and the flood of bodies is released   I can t say I really blame those students for just trying to get out of school  some of the people that jumped weren t even bad people  but it was insane that they would break stuff so unnecessarily  And I hope the teachers know that sometimes they are the reason that bad things happen
summary: The people at my school are insane. They destroyed a fence to get out of the school. There is a camera on the neighbour's house, but that doesn't stop them from destroying the fence.    The teacher finally arrived after a lot of people had tried to open the side gate.
cleaned: people school insane destroy fence school camera neighbours house not stop destroy fence teacher finally arrive lot people try open gate
